Articles.Content:
I ran a couple tests on the new flight characteristics and recorded some data. It's definitely not an exhaustive test or maybe not the most representative one. Here's the link to the Imgur album. 

[http://imgur.com/a/XLTtm](http://imgur.com/a/XLTtm)

Tell me what you think ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Thanks,

RailgunSpoon
thank you for your conclusive results! I will keep this in mind!

All I know is, back in 0.90 or even earlier, I made a dragster powered by about 250 Sepratrons. In the old air, it could (assuming it didn't flip out and crash) reach a top speed of 545m/s in the length of the runeay. The same dragster in 1.0 now exceeds 750m/s on the runway (again, assuming it stays on the ground) ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif).
Lol Yeah I can't wait to try out a sepatron only mission to the mun ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
